name: Ulceration
title: Ulceration
notes:
**Note 1:** Physician statement of microscopically confirmed ulceration (e.g., based on biopsy or surgical resection) can be used to code this data item. 

**Note 2:** Ulceration can only be confirmed by microscopic examination. Do not use findings from physical exam. 

**Note 3:** Melanoma ulceration is the absence of an intact epidermis overlying the primary melanoma based upon histopathological examination.
